I'm Leo Tartari, a designer crazy about technology.

I have a background in Interaction Design, Information Architecture and Front-end Development.

As a career goal I am restless for improving the experience of users on web and mobile apps always focusing on clarity, ease of use, and simplicity.

With more than eight years of combined experience I have worked as a designer for companies of all sizes and domains.

I am skilled at working with agile methodologies and advocate for a leaner UX practice.
